description.full: Grab your friends and family and warm up those vocal chords! "Lips: Number One Hits" sets the stage for the ultimate singing party with a new collection of global chart-topping songs to satisfy even the choosiest of performers. So regardless if your preferred stage is an amphitheatre or just your living room, everyone will love the latest from Xbox 360's exclusive singing franchise.
